projects.name: Renuza Technologies Pvt Ltd
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive, user-friendly company website featuring product listings, inquiry forms, and admin panel. Integrated Google Sheets for data management and ensured cross-browser compatibility.

projects.name: Weather Report
projects.description: Created a web application to fetch and display live weather data based on user location. Features include city-wise forecasts, temperature, humidity levels, and dynamic weather icons with responsive design.

projects.name: Blockchain-based Authentication Model
projects.description: Developed a decentralized authentication scheme to prevent data from hacker attacks. The project focused on ensuring cybersecurity by safeguarding sensitive information and improving the integrity and confidentiality of networks.
